thread.title: Kim Marie Abbott
thread.title_full: PastBook Beoordeeld door Kim Marie Abbott

author: Kim Marie Abbott
title: Kim Marie Abbott
text: This company took my money, and I never received my book. I have emailed at least six times and called at least five times with no response except the same email twice, stating that my book shipped out. All I asked for was a tracking number, which I never got. This company is fraudulent. This company has email responses that are all happy and a lady who answers their voicemails very politely. They smile as they take your money. Very very slimy. I will be reporting them to my bank as fraud and also to the Better Business Bureau.
